-------------------------------------------------------------------
 P C O  AG    -    TECHNICAL  INFORMATION  DOCUMENT
-------------------------------------------------------------------

README FOR SOFTWARE/VERSION:  
SDK Release 1.26

FOR PCO PRODUCT/VERSION:
pco.camera (pco.dimax, pco.edge, etc.)

DESCRIPTION:

This packages includes an setup, which installs the SDK-files
in your system in the standard directory.


CONTENTS:

Archive File Name: SW_PCOSDKWIN_126.exe

Installation Instructions:

Copy the SW_PCOSDKWIN_126.zip to a distinct directory (e.g. PCOSDK). 

1.  Select above directory ( e.g. 'PCOSDK').
2.  Unzip the files to a directory of your choice: e.g. c:\pcosdk\include
3.  Start 'setup.exe'.
4.  Follow the steps in the setup dialog.
VERSION HISTORY:

Version 1.26
- tbd.

Version 1.25
- bugfixes

Version 1.24
- Added pco.dicam function calls
- bugfixes

Version 1.22
- Added Lens Control functionality
- bugfixes

Version 1.21
- New manual
- New Matlab adaptor
- bugfixes

Version 1.20:
- Added CLHS
- bugfixes

Version 1.19:
- bugfixes

Version 1.18:
- Added PCO_GetCoolingSetpoints
- Added HWIO timing settings, LED settings, CMOS line time settings
- Added ini-flags for Hotpixel Correction and filter setting
- hmm, and yes: some bugfixes (again)

Version 1.17:
- Added Soft-ROI functionality
- Changed edit behavior in Delay/Exposure edit control
- Bugfixes

Version 1.16:
- Added PCO_G(S)etAcquireModeEx
- bugfixes

Version 1.15:
- Added color set to structures
- Added PCO_(S)GetColorSettings

Version 1.14:
- Added power save mode functions
- bugfixes

Version 1.13:
- added pco.edge
- enhanced dimax functionality

Version 1.11
- enhanced dimax settings/options
- bugfixes

Version 1.10
- dimax/gige added (not released)

Version 1.09
- Prepared for GigE and pco.dimax
- bugfixes

Version 1.08
- Added modulate mode
- bugfixes and some improvements in logging
- Added Delphi and VB sample

Version 1.07
- Dll dependencies will be shown in the log-file to fix errors faster.
- fixed error in number of image calculation

Version 1.06
- added Modulate Mode
- bugfixes

Version 1.05
- bugfixes

Version 1.04
- added Noisefilter Mode
- added Record Stop Event functionality

Version 1.03
- various bugfixes
- added PCO_OpenCameraEx
- added PCO_AddBufferEx
- added PCO_GetImageEx

Version 1.02
- added CamLink interfaces
- added some new calls
- PCO_AllocateBuffer can handle external allocated buffers, now.

Version 1.01.514
- Fixed wrong function decoration for PCO_G(S)etBitAlignment.

Version 101
- new release

Version 100
- new release

KNOWN BUGS:

Installation problems:

If you run into problems during the installation you could delete the 
following directory and its contents (if existent):
C:\program files\installshield installation information\{4A30B691-D148-4C22-81FF-9ADDA6CF9AC6}
'C:\program files\' depends on your sytem and might be different.
